title: Rs. 13.36 b in cash to families affected by economic crisis
body_lines: The Cabinet of Ministers at its meeting on Monday approved to provide Rs. 13.36 billion special three-month cash allowance to 3.34 million families affected by the current economic crisis.
The financial assistance will be provided to low-income families identified under Samurdhi, Elderly, Kidney and Disabilities from May to July 2022.
